Class CommentEndpoint

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.softserve.taf.services.common.AbstractWebEndpoint
      • CommentEndpoint
  • public class CommentEndpoint
extends com.softserve.taf.services.common.AbstractWebEndpoint
    This class is an implementation of AbstractWebEndpoint and it provides operations for creating, updating, retrieving individual and all comments from the server.
